text: Kò sí ẹnì kan nínú yín àfi kí ó débẹ̀. Ó jẹ́ ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ dandan lọ́dọ̀ Olúwa rẹ. 74:30-31. Bákan náà, kalmọh “wārid” t’ó jẹyọ nínú āyah 71 jẹ́ ọ̀rọ̀-orúkọ tí wọ́n ṣẹ̀dá láti ara ọ̀rọ̀-ìṣe “warada”. Nínú al-Ƙur’ān, ìtúmọ̀ méjì péré l’ó wà fún “warada”. “Warada” túmọ̀ sí “ó dé sí ibi tí kiní kan wà, ó sì wọ inú n̄ǹkan náà”, gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìtúmọ̀ yìí ṣe wà nínú sūrah Hūd 11:98 àti sūrah al-’Anbiyā’
